title: "Rest of her life" Cover font
content:
It looks like Garamond, but it is from the novel "Rest of her life"  
Sample is attached.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Type1.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120805/http:/typophile.com/files/Type1.JPG) | 17.24 KB |
author: dhannah1000

comments.content: I ran it throught TypeDNA FontEdge font recognition tool and it says: Garamond Bold Italic

_Garamond Bold Italic_

darreng,  
it sure is a Garamond, but which one? There are so many.  
I couldn’t find an exact match.

Here is what I have:  
Name: AGaramond BoldItalic (LT\_50571.ttf) Version: Version 7.00; 2005

It definitely isn’t Adobe Garamond.  
Trust me and trust your own eyes.
